attributes.action: This is to Trial a Cannabis Cafe In Newquay Cornwall, As they do in the netherlands.
attributes.additional_details:
This is a Petition To Trial The Cannabis Style Cafe's That They Have In The Netherlands.

This would be a way of Legally Controlling the Substance In A Safe Environment Whether it be for Medical Or Personal Use This Would Benefit Everyone Associated With Cannabis Apart From Illegal Dealers Which If This Scheme Worked Should Completely Abolish The Illegal Side Of Cannabis.

I am petitioning for This As I my mother Had cancer for 20 years and sadly passed away in 2009, she used cannabis for as long as i can remember as it helped her cope until the end, i know doctors that have agreed that is what helped her sustain a life over the years.
